content: A-GPB Non-woven wheel Ultimate non-woven wheels for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve satin finish, mirror finish or a defined surface roughness with our broad grade selection for rough to fine grinding Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Non-woven sleeves engineered to reduce marks, smears and last longer Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Fine grinding – finishing carbon and stainless steel to a smooth, uniform and attractive appearance Surface finishing – removing scratches from steel surfaces ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Diameter: 100 mm Width: 3.9 in Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243416 - Non-woven flap wheel A-GPB 100 SPX mediu - Package Size 1 pc - 2243414 - Non-woven flap wheel A-GPB 100SPX v-fine - Package Size 1 pc
